00006 EnvironmentDrawWindow::EnvironmentDrawWindow(Controller m,int x,int y,int w,int h,const char *lab):Fl_Widget(x,y,w,h,lab)
00007 {
00008         MouseX = Fl::event_x();
00009         MouseY = Fl::event_y();
00010         xPos = x;
00011         yPos = y;
00012         wPos = w;
00013         hPos = h;
00014         size =100;
00015         dragging = false;
00016         margin = 5;
00017         this->placing = "";
00018         this->connecting = false;
00019         int x1 = xPos+size;
00020         int y1 = yPos+size;
00021         int x2 = x1+wPos-(2*size);
00022         int y2 = y1+hPos-(2*size);
00023 }

00029 void EnvironmentDrawWindow::draw(void){
00030         fl_draw_box(FL_FLAT_BOX, xPos, yPos, wPos, hPos, FL_BACKGROUND_COLOR);
00031         fl_frame("AAAA", xPos, yPos, wPos, hPos);
00032         fl_draw(this->placing.c_str(),xPos+2,yPos+(GRIDSPACING/2)+2);
00033         this->drawGrid();
00034         for(int i=0; i < shapes.size(); i++)
00035         {
00036                 Shape s = shapes.at(i);
00037                 Point2D p = s.location;
00038                 //fl_draw(s.name.c_str(),p.getX(),p.getY());
00039                 if(s.name == "Circle"){
00040                         fl_pie(p.getX(), p.getY(), GRIDSPACING, GRIDSPACING, 0, 360);
00041                 }
00042                 if(s.name == "Box"){
00043                         fl_draw_box(FL_FLAT_BOX, p.getX(),p.getY(),GRIDSPACING, GRIDSPACING,FL_BLACK);
00044                 }
00045                 if(s.name == "Light Stim"){
00046                         fl_circle(p.getX()+(GRIDSPACING/2),p.getY()+(GRIDSPACING/2),GRIDSPACING/2);
00047                         fl_draw("LS",p.getX()-8+(GRIDSPACING/2),p.getY()+5+(GRIDSPACING/2));
00048                 }
00049                 if(s.name == "Sound Stim"){
00050                         fl_circle(p.getX()+(GRIDSPACING/2),p.getY()+(GRIDSPACING/2),GRIDSPACING/2);
00051                         fl_draw("SS",p.getX()-8+(GRIDSPACING/2),p.getY()+5+(GRIDSPACING/2));
00052                 }
00053                 if(s.name == "Vehicle"){
00054                         fl_draw_box(FL_FLAT_BOX, p.getX()+(GRIDSPACING/4),p.getY()+(GRIDSPACING/4),GRIDSPACING-(GRIDSPACING/2),GRIDSPACING-(GRIDSPACING/2),FL_BLACK);
00055                 }
00056         }
00057 
00058         
00059 }

00061 int EnvironmentDrawWindow::handle(int event){
00062         if(event==FL_PUSH){
00063                 if(connecting == true){
00064                         int xNorm = normalizeX(Fl::event_x());
00065                         int yNorm = normalizeY(Fl::event_y());
00066                         if(xNorm != -1 && yNorm != -1){
00067                                 if(this->placing == "Vehicle"){
00068                                         shapes.push_back(Shape(Point2D(xNorm,yNorm, 0 , 5 , 1),this->placing, this->nextFileName));
00069                                 }
00070                                 else{
00071                                         shapes.push_back(Shape(Point2D(xNorm,yNorm, 0 , 5 , 1),this->placing , ""));
00072                                 }
00073                                 this->redraw();
00074                         }
00075                 }
00076         }
00077         return 1;
00078 }
00079 
00080 void EnvironmentDrawWindow::drawGrid(){
00081         for(int i=this->xPos+GRIDSPACING; i< this->wPos+xPos; i+=GRIDSPACING){
00082                 
00083                 fl_line(i, yPos+GRIDSPACING, i, this->hPos+yPos-GRIDSPACING); 
00084         }
00085         for(int i=this->yPos+GRIDSPACING; i< this->hPos+yPos; i+=GRIDSPACING){
00086                 
00087                 fl_line(xPos+GRIDSPACING, i, xPos+wPos-GRIDSPACING, i); 
00088         }
00089 }
00090 
00091 int EnvironmentDrawWindow::normalizeX(int x){
00092         bool first = true;
00093         for(int i=this->xPos+GRIDSPACING; i< this->wPos+xPos; i+=GRIDSPACING){
00094                 if(i > x){
00095                         if(first){
00096                                 return -1;
00097                         }
00098                         return (i-GRIDSPACING);
00099                 }
00100                 first = false;
00101         }
00102         return -1;
00103 }
00104 
00105 int EnvironmentDrawWindow::normalizeY(int y){
00106         bool first = true;
00107         for(int i=this->yPos+GRIDSPACING; i< this->hPos+yPos; i+=GRIDSPACING){
00108                 if(i > y){
00109                         if(first){
00110                                 return -1;
00111                         }
00112                         return (i-GRIDSPACING);
00113                 }
00114                 first = false;
00115         }
00116         return -1;
00117 }

00119 void EnvironmentDrawWindow::save(string filename){
00120         ofstream myfile;
00121 
00122         if(filename.length() == 0){
00123                 return;
00124         }
00125         myfile.open (filename.c_str());
00126         myfile << "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\" standalone=\"no\"?>" << endl;
00127         myfile << "<root>" << endl;
00128         for(int i =0; i< shapes.size(); i++){
00129                 Shape s = shapes.at(i);
00130                 if(s.name == "Vehicle"){
00131                         ifstream infile (s.fileName.c_str());
00132                         if (infile.is_open())
00133                         {
00134                                 while (! infile.eof() )
00135                                 {       string tempFileName;
00136                                 getline (infile,tempFileName);
00137                                 myfile << tempFileName << endl;
00138                                 }
00139                         }
00140 
00141                 }
00142 
00143         }
00144         for(int i =0; i< shapes.size(); i++){
00145                 Shape s = shapes.at(i);
00146                 if(s.name == "Box" || s.name == "Circle"){
00147                         myfile << "<obstacle id=\"" << s.name << "\">" << endl;
00148                         myfile << "<px>"<< s.location.getX()<< "</px>" << endl;
00149                         myfile <<"<py>" << s.location.getY()<<"</py>" << endl;
00150                         myfile << "</obstacle>" << endl;
00151                 }else{
00152                         if(s.name != "Vehicle"){
00153                                 myfile << "<stimuli id=\"" << s.name << "\">" << endl;
00154                                 myfile << "<px>"<< s.location.getX()<< "</px>" << endl;
00155                                 myfile <<"<py>" << s.location.getY()<<"</py>" << endl;
00156                                 myfile << "</stimuli>" << endl;
00157                         }
00158                 }
00159         }
00160         myfile << "</root>" << endl;
00161         myfile.close();
00162 }
